title: Hadith of a woman who used to throw garbage at the Prophet ﷺ‎, is it authentic? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: finally sarah says there is a hadith about an old woman who used to throw garbage at the prophet is this authentic the answer is no this is not authentic and yes i know that a lot of the people circulate it but it has no authenticity to it and allah azzawajal knows best so you
